data.title: YER - Yemeni Rial rates, news, and tools
data.meta_description: Get Yemeni Rial rates, news, and facts. Also available are services like cheap money transfers, a currency data API, and more.
data.text:
YER - Yemeni Rial

The Yemeni Rial is the currency of Yemen. Our currency rankings show that the most popular Yemeni Rial exchange rate is the YER to USD rate. The currency code for Rials is YER , and the currency symbol is ï·¼. Below, you'll find Yemeni Rial rates and a currency converter.
